Key Match Events: Jos Buttler and Alex Hales put on an unbeaten 170-run partnership
Post-Match Reflections: England advanced to the final after winning the match by 10 wickets
Alex Hales was awarded the player of the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Adelaide Oval on November 10, 2022
England elected to field first and restricted India to 168/6
England chased down the target with ease, winning the match by 10 wickets
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23
The series result was England advancing to the final
